content: Well, we don't -- good to talk to you, but we don't usually kind of talk about exactly sales numbers, some individual products from Humira or for Hadlima, but we feel very good that this coming year will be a solid year for Hadlima on a few fronts: one, Canada and Australia continue to do very well in terms of their overall continuing progression in terms of their performance, strong double-digit growth outside of the U.S. for Hadlima; and second, we'll have half a year of Hadlima sales when we're in the U.S.
